page.title: 10HEALTH & MEDICAL FACILITIES
page.content: {GENERAL HEALTH}in area good,but best in rural areas due partly to a less stressful and more healthy environment.Much of doctors' time spent treating minor illnesses:coughs, colds,'flu,etc.Major illnesses cancer and other smoking_induced complaints. {FACILITIES:}No Doctors' surgeries nor opticians in area so patients have to travel to nearest Dr. in Newbury on whose list they have been placed.24 hr.service available.One {Private {dentist}in area.{Health visitors, {District Nurses}supplement work of Doctors. They and {School Doctors & {Nurses}implement and encourage growing interest in preventative medicine. Hospitals: none in area. {BIRTHS:}Mainly at hospitals at { {Reading and Newbury. {DEATHS:}during period 1980-84,av.age was 70;19 burials;2/3rds cremated.
